languages.text: "Да..." {n}— шепчет человек.{/n} "Корабль... и планета... предатели среди братии, терзающие священные механизмы, впускающие скверну в их системы. Они превратили святое в нечестивое! И спустили эти новые, искаженные машины на нас, своих техносоратников! Мы смогли бежать — но одно из чудовищ пробралось на корабль".

"Yes..." {n}the man whispers.{/n} "The ship... and the planet... the traitors among our brethren, tormenting the sacred mechanisms, letting corruption into their systems. They turned that which is holy into the unholy! And they set these new, twisted machines on us, their tech-comrades! We managed to flee, but one of the monsters found its way onto the ship."
languages.original_text: "Да..." {n}— шепчет человек.{/n} "Корабль... и планета... предатели среди братии, терзающие священные механизмы, впускающие скверну в их системы. Они превратили святое в нечестивое! И спустили эти новые, искаженные машины на нас, своих техносоратников! Мы смогли бежать — но одно из чудовищ пробралось на корабль".

They turned that which is holy into the unholy! And they set these new, twisted Machines on us, their brothers! We managed to flee — but one of the monsters found its way onto the ship."

They turned that which is holy into the unholy! And they set these new, twisted machines on us, their tech-comrades! We managed to flee, but one of the monsters found its way onto the ship."

languages.text: “没错……”{n}这个人低声说道。{/n}“这艘飞船……还有那颗行星……我们的伙伴之中出现了叛徒。他们扭曲了神圣的机械，让腐化进入了他们的系统。他们将圣洁的一切都变成了邪恶之物！而且，他们将这些新的、扭曲的机器安装在我们身上，安装在他们的伙伴们身上！我们逃跑了，但其中一只怪物却渗透到了这艘船上。”
languages.original_text: "Yes..." {n}the man whispers.{/n} "The ship... and the planet... the traitors among our brethren, tormenting the sacred mechanisms, letting corruption into their systems. They turned that which is holy into the unholy! And they set these new, twisted machines on us, their tech-comrades! We managed to flee, but one of the monsters found its way onto the ship."

traits.locale_text: “没错……”{n}这个人低声说道。{/n}“这艘飞船……还有那颗行星……我们的兄弟之间出现了叛徒。他们扭曲了神圣的机械，让腐化进入了他们的系统。他们将圣洁的一切都变成了邪恶之物！而且，他们将这些新的、扭曲的机器安装在我们身上，安装在他们的兄弟们身上！我们逃跑了，但其中一只怪物却渗透到了这艘船上。”

languages.text: «Sí...». {n}El hombre susurra.{/n} «La nave... y el planeta... había traidores entre nuestros hermanos, torturando los sagrados mecanismos y dejando que la corrupción entrara en sus sistemas. ¡Convirtieron lo sagrado en sacrílego! Y enviaron estas nuevas y retorcidas máquinas contra nosotros, ¡contra sus propios tecnocamaradas! Logramos huir, pero uno de esos monstruos logró subir a la nave».
languages.original_text: "Yes..." {n}the man whispers.{/n} "The ship... and the planet... the traitors among our brethren, tormenting the sacred mechanisms, letting corruption into their systems. They turned that which is holy into the unholy! And they set these new, twisted machines on us, their tech-comrades! We managed to flee, but one of the monsters found its way onto the ship."

traits.locale_text: «Sí...». {n}El hombre susurra.{/n} «La nave... y el planeta... había traidores entre nuestros hermanos, torturando los sagrados mecanismo y dejando que la corrupción entrara en sus sistemas. ¡Convirtieron lo sagrado en sacrílego! Y enviaron estas nuevas y retorcidas máquinas contra nosotros, ¡contra sus propios hermanos! Logramos huir, pero uno de esos monstruos logró subir a la nave».

languages.text: 「あぁ…」{n}男は囁く。{/n}「船…それに惑星…同胞の中の裏切り者が、神聖な機械を苦しめて、そのシステムに腐敗を紛れ込ませた。神聖なものを真逆のものにしてしまった！そして、奴らはこの新たな歪んだ機械を、我々の技術同胞に仕立て上げた！命からがら逃げたが、怪物が一匹、船に乗り込んでしまったんだ」
languages.original_text: "Yes..." {n}the man whispers.{/n} "The ship... and the planet... the traitors among our brethren, tormenting the sacred mechanisms, letting corruption into their systems. They turned that which is holy into the unholy! And they set these new, twisted machines on us, their tech-comrades! We managed to flee, but one of the monsters found its way onto the ship."

traits.locale_text: 「あぁ…」{n}男は囁く。{/n}「船…それに惑星…同胞の中の裏切り者が、神聖な機械を苦しめて、そのシステムに腐敗を紛れ込ませた。神聖なものを真逆のものにしてしまった！そして、奴らはこの新たな歪んだ機械を、我々の技術同胞に仕立て上げた！命からがら逃げたが、怪物が一匹、船に乗り込んでしまったんだ」

languages.text: "Ja ...", {n}flüstert der Mann.{/n} "Das Schiff ... und der Planet ... die Verräter unter unseren Brüdern, die die heiligen Mechanismen malträtiert und so die Korruption in die Systeme gelassen haben. Sie haben alles Heilige in etwas Unheiliges verwandelt! Und sie haben diese neuen, pervertierten Maschinen auf uns, ihre Tech-Kameraden , gehetzt! Wir konnten fliehen, aber eines der Monster hat es auf das Schiff geschafft."
languages.original_text: "Yes..." {n}the man whispers.{/n} "The ship... and the planet... the traitors among our brethren, tormenting the sacred mechanisms, letting corruption into their systems. They turned that which is holy into the unholy! And they set these new, twisted machines on us, their tech-comrades! We managed to flee, but one of the monsters found its way onto the ship."

traits.locale_text: "Ja ...", {n}flüstert der Mann.{/n} "Das Schiff ... und der Planet ... die Verräter unter unseren Brüdern, die die heiligen Mechanismen malträtiert und so die Korruption in die Systeme gelassen haben. Sie haben alle Heilige in etwas Unheiliges verwandelt! Und sie haben diese neuen, pervertierten Maschinen auf uns, ihre Brüder, gehetzt! Wir konnten fliehen, aber eines der Monster hat es auf das Schiff geschafft."

languages.text: « Oui, {n}murmure l'homme.{/n} Le vaisseau... et la planète... les traîtres dans nos rangs, tourmentant les mécanismes sacrés, livrant leurs systèmes à la corruption. Ils ont profané tout ce qui était sacré sur l'autel de leur impiété ! Et ils nous ont implanté ces nouvelles machines perverties, à nous, leurs propres technoconfrères ! Nous avons réussi à nous échapper, mais l'un des monstres s'est introduit à bord du vaisseau. »
languages.original_text: "Yes..." {n}the man whispers.{/n} "The ship... and the planet... the traitors among our brethren, tormenting the sacred mechanisms, letting corruption into their systems. They turned that which is holy into the unholy! And they set these new, twisted machines on us, their tech-comrades! We managed to flee, but one of the monsters found its way onto the ship."

traits.locale_text: « Oui, {n}murmure l'homme.{/n} Le vaisseau... et la planète... les traîtres dans nos rangs, tourmentant les mécanismes sacrés, livrant leurs systèmes à la corruption. Ils ont profané tout ce qui était sacré sur l'autel de leur impiété ! Et ils nous ont implanté ces nouvelles machines perverties, à nous, leurs propres frères ! Nous avons réussi à nous échapper, mais l'un des monstres s'est introduit à bord du vaisseau. »

languages.text: "Evet." {n}diye fısıldıyor adam.{/n} "Gemi... Gezegen... Kardeşlerimiz arasında hainler var. Kutsal mekanizmalara eziyet ediyor, sistemlerine yozlaşmanın girmesini müsaade ediyorlar. Kutsal olanı kâfirliğin kölesine çeviriyorlar! Bu yeni ve sapkın makineleri bizlerin, tekno yoldaşlarının üstüne saldılar! Kaçmayı başardık lakin o canavarlardan biri, gemiye sızmanın yolunu buldu."
languages.original_text: "Yes..." {n}the man whispers.{/n} "The ship... and the planet... the traitors among our brethren, tormenting the sacred mechanisms, letting corruption into their systems. They turned that which is holy into the unholy! And they set these new, twisted machines on us, their tech-comrades! We managed to flee, but one of the monsters found its way onto the ship."

traits.locale_text: "Evet." {n}diye fısıldıyor adam.{/n} "Gemi... Gezegen... Kardeşlerimiz arasında hainler var. Kutsal mekanizmalara eziyet ediyor, sistemlerine yozlaşmanın girmesini müsaade ediyorlar. Kutsal olanı kâfirliğin kölesine çeviriyorlar! Bu yeni ve sapkın makineleri bizlerin, tekno yoldaşlarının üstüne saldılar! Kaçmayı başardık lakin o canavarlardan biri, gemiye sızmanın yolunu buldu."
